name: Streyner
overview:
Streyner The product of experience cut from the digital landscape, Streyner is a function specific digital search agency dedicated to working alongside interactive and multimedia companies throughout the major US markets; and claims an elevated level of qualifiable accountability by limiting clientele.

Client side, Streyner often acts as â€˜theâ€™ search component of the client; enabling a confidence to allow sufficient allocation of resources necessary in facilitating a successful search. Understanding that initiative-driven hires and precise candidate searches, combined with a limited number of hours in the day, will often lead only to frustration and a much needed but vacant desk, it is recognized that a reputation is forged and defended with each and every search performed.

Streyner nurtures a nationwide Top 10 people network and can boast a robust background of experience and knowledge base. Collectively this team has sold digital media, bought digital media, built as well as acquired it. Perhaps most importantly though, Streyner continues to grow it; and works with companies, big and small, that share a common interest: healthy, efficient, structured growth.

Mariam Gabra, formerly in Sales with companies including RMM, MySpace RockYou! and Yahoo’s Citizen Sports is Streyner’s Director of Advertising Search. Nick McDonald, formerly leading the development and build out of a national territory for of a larger search agency is Streyner’s Digital Search Lead and Mike Weyer, formerly of Oracle as a Technical Solutions Recruiter II where he worked on Core Technology and Solutions Sales positions, is Streyner’s Consumer Tech Search Lead.

Streyner. Born with client growth in mind.
